obj.name: Cupboard
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the/gen_furniture
obj.action_dia: You open the creaky door of your sibling's cupboard... you stare in disbelief. There's a person in there, with their back to you. They look more like a shadow than a person. You slam the cupboard shut again, and stand back from it.
obj.used_dialogue: You don't want to get anywhere near that cupboard again.

obj.name: Mirror
obj.action_dia: You look into the mirror. It looks painfully bright in there.

obj.name: Downstairs dresser
obj.action_dia: You rummage through the dresser, you find an old photograph. You pocket it.
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through the dresser again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Dream bath
obj.action_dia: You lie in the bath. You sit in it for a second or two, waiting. After a few more seconds of waiting, the memories assault you.

obj.name: Open box
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the
obj.action_dia: You rifle through the box, and take out a bath bomb.
obj.used_dialogue: You rifle through the box again, but nothing specific jumps out at you.

obj.name: Garage shelves
